commit message: commit changelog entries used in the Play Store
add /storage/extSDCard, path for 2nd SD Card on some Samsungs (closes #60)

not all devices/distros have mknod, include busybox's (#56)

It seems that the HTC One does not include mknod, luckily busybox
provides it.  Thanks to peterosterlund2 for this fix.

when creating a loop dev, manually specify permissions (closes #56)

'The umask is 000 so the loop device permission needs to be
explicitly set to 600' -peterosterlund2  (thanks for the patch!)

add READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission to future proof

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is currently automatically provided as part of
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.  But that is likely to change in the future.
